game_description: Days of Heroes: D-Day have a two unique perspectives, experience the largest landing operation in martial history regarding the forces and means used. Take on the role of an airborne division jumper who descends into enemy territory to destabilize the enemy troops under the cover of night. Alternately, become a soldier beginning their heavy crossing of Omaha beach on D-Day. Complete diversified military missions, from short- and long-range skirmishes with Nazis, by employing anti-aircraft fire, destroying enemy tanks, and breaking through the trenches and escaping from a firing squad. Use over a dozen weapons typical to the World War II period that have been accurately reproduced in terms of appearance and mechanics. Finish the campaign and practice your skills on the shooting range, which offers four different gameplay modes. Once ready, try Hardcore Mode, which will take your cleverness, strategic thinking, and will to survive to the extreme.
review_1: One of the best VR games I‚Äôve ever play!!! Every time I put my VR on, this is one of the first games I play. Although the graphics are low-poly it still really great. Definitely worth it.
review_2: This indi poly game is a fantastic game. With this studio you will revive D-Day like Medal of Honor Allied Assault (or wwii call of duty D-day) but with poly graphics and severals and varied chapters, where you will go in different transports, you will use many iconic weapons, you will be a sniper with slow motion if you bring your rifle closer to your sight... You can see the taste and effort to do something good. I think it's the best game in length, variety and replayability with Poly aesthetics I've seen. Incredible first game for a studio. keep it upüç∫
review_4: One of the better WW2 games I've played on Quest 2! Hope they add more content of battles after D-Day. I would pay for that, just throwing that out there lol
review_5: Definitely the best ww2 game on vr I've played. I love the large intense fights as well as the infantry based combat. One minor setback is that for me, the hand poses on the kar 98, m1903 sniper and BAR are glitching so hopefully you can fix that. Are you guys planning any after launch content?if so I have some suggestions: Ability to play as more factions e.g. British and german. or you could maybe make a whole new game for new factions or time periods.
